async_context.name: async_context
async_context.values: doc.reference=Document|icon.theme=Icon theme|locale=Language|rendering.defaultsyntax=Default syntax|rendering.restricted=Restricted|rendering.targetsyntax=Target syntax|request.base=Request base URL|request.parameters=Request parameters|request.url=Request URL|request.wiki=Request wiki|user=User|wiki=Wiki

contentDescription.name: contentDescription
contentDescription.prettyName: Content description (Not applicable for "No content" type)

property.code:
{{velocity}} #set ($displayMacro = true) #set ($users = $xcontext.macro.params.users) #if ("$!xcontext.macro.params.displayWatchedUsersOnly" == 'true') #set ($watchedUsers = $services.notification.watch.watchedUsers) #if ($watchedUsers.isEmpty()) {{warning}} {{translation key="notifications.macro.noWatchedUsers" /}} {{/warning}} #set ($displayMacro = false) #else #set ($users = $stringtool.join($services.notification.watch.watchedUsers, ',')) #end #end #if ($displayMacro) #set ($discard = $xwiki.jsx.use('XWiki.Notifications.Code.Macro.NotificationsMacro')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.Notifications.Code.Macro.NotificationsMacro')) #set ($discard = $xwiki.ssx.use('XWiki.Notifications.Code.NotificationsDisplayerUIX')) #set ($parameters = { "userId": "$!escapetool.xml($services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'default'))", "maxCount": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.count)", "useUserPreferences": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.useUserPreferences)", "displayOwnEvents": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.displayOwnEvents)", "displayMinorEvents": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.displayMinorEvents)", "displaySystemEvents": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.displaySystemEvents)", "displayReadEvents": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.displayReadEvents)", "wikis": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.wikis)", "spaces": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.spaces)", "pages": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.pages)", "users": "$!escapetool.xml($users)", "currentWiki": "$!escapetool.xml($services.wiki.currentWikiId)", "tags": "$!escapetool.xml($xcontext.macro.params.tags)" }) #set ($dataParameters = []) #foreach($key in $parameters.keySet()) #set($discard = $dataParameters.add("data-$key=""$parameters.get($key)""")) #end #set($notifParameters = $services.notification.sources.getNotificationParameters($parameters)) #set($notifs = $services.notification.notifiers.getNotifications($notifParameters)) {{html clean="false"}}
#if ('true' == $xcontext.macro.params.displayRSSLink) ## Generate the RSS URL to display the same notifications but in the RSS format #set ($rssURL = $services.rest.url($doc.documentReference)) #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL.substring(0, $rssURL.indexOf('/rest'))}/rest/notifications/rss") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}?userId=$!escapetool.url($services.model.serialize($xcontext.userReference, 'default'))") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&useUserPreferences=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.useUserPreferences)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&count=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.count)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&displayOwnEvents=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.displayOwnEvents)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&displayMinorEvents=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.displayMinorEvents)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&displaySystemEvents=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.displaySystemEvents)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&displayReadEvents=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.displayReadEvents)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&wikis=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.wikis)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&spaces=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.spaces)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&pages=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.pages)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&users=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.users)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&displayReadStatus=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.displayReadStatus)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}&tags=$!escapetool.url($xcontext.macro.params.tags)") #set ($rssURL = "${rssURL}¤tWiki=$!escapetool.url($services.wiki.currentWikiId)")

$services.icon.renderHTML('rss') $escapetool.xml($services.localization.render('notifications.rss.feedLink'))
